bobble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a small soft ball, usually made of wool, that is used especially for decorating clothes
bobble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her pullover had bobbles on the front.
bobble.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to drop or hold a ball in an uncontrolled way
bobble.translation[1].definitions[1].def: if a piece of clothing bobbles, especially a sweater, it forms little balls on the surface of the cloth after it has been worn or washed
